problem_text_cn: 如图,在▱ABCD中,AD=5,AB=3,AE平分∠BAD交BC边于点E,则线段BE、EC的长度分别为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, AD = N_0, AB = N_1, AE bisects ∠BAD and intersects the BC edge at point E, then the length of the line segments EC is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AE平分∠BAD交BC边于点E,∴∠BAE=∠EAD,∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AD∥BC,AD=BC=5,∴∠DAE=∠AEB,∴∠BAE=∠AEB,∴AB=BE=3,∴EC=BC-BE=5-3=2．故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题主要考查了角平分线、平行四边形的性质及等腰三角形的判定,根据已知得出∠BAE=∠AEB是解决问题的关键．
